extension.name: Workspace Manager
extension.description: Files in the Workspace folder can be managed and edited.

releases.release: - Make navigation work with Sympnony 2.4 beta
- New filename appears in breadcrumbs when file is saved (like is should have before).
- Directories/files page partially reorganized. - Ability to save files using Ctrl + s added.
- Improved design/appearance of page showing directories and files.
